location.place: 401 Pacific Coast Hwy, Huntington Beach, CA
location.scene: The scenes where 'Jim Street' (Colin Farrell) is exercising on the beach (after he's quit S.W.A.T.) appear to have been filmed along the Huntington Beach- Sunset Beach coastal area

location.place: Intersection of PCH and 6th St. in Huntington Beach, California
location.scene: the faultline crack runs down the street to the beach with onlookers just standing watching in disbelief.
